p: We chose to evaluate the impacts of the high emission scenario (RCP8.5) and the intermediate pathway (RCP4.5) until 2050. The RCP4.5 was chosen instead of RCP6.0 because the predicted emission of RCP8.5 by the end of the century is close to the emission level of the RCP6.0 [ 70]. Furthermore, these two scenarios are the most commonly used in climate change analysis.
